title: 'Value for money at this price range.'
body: 'For the amount that you pay this blazer is worth it. The padding near the shoulders is a bit too much and it sticks out a bit but apart from that the fit is actually quite nice. It is lightweight and pleasant to wear. All in all a value for money product worth buying in this price range.'

title: It's not a cotton blazer
body: Because the fabric is not cotton and it's more like a satiny fabric, it has a shine on it which makes it look grey rather than black. Does not look even close to what has been shown in the images. The thing which has put me off the most is the lack of colour accuracy represented in the pictures. Size and fit were okay.
